name: coolingTemperature_decrease
description: This function is used to lower the cooling temperature set on SmartThings devices.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to lower the cooling temperature.

parameters.name: coolingTemperatureDelta
parameters.description: The amount by which to decrease the cooling temperature.
